actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974  with respect to benefits payable to certain individuals who on December 31, 1974, had at least ten years of railroad service and also were fully insured under the Social Security Act.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to revise the computation of employee, spouse, and survivor annuities with respect to railroad employees who as of December 31, 1974, had at least ten years of service and were fully insured under the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974  with respect to benefits payable to certain individuals who on December 31, 1974, had at least ten years of railroad service and also were fully insured under the Social Security Act.
